meanings.definition: A student at a naval academy.
meanings.sent1: The midshipmen studied navigation and maritime history.
meanings.sent2: The midshipmen marched in formation during the graduation ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The midshipmen tried to sneak extra cookies from the mess hall.
meanings.sent4: The midshipmen were the future leaders of the navy, learning the ropes of command.
meanings.sent5: The midshipmen's uniforms gleamed in the sunlight as they practiced drills on the deck.

meanings.definition: A young fish of the genus Porichthys.
